stimulusHtml: The chart above supports which of the following conclusions?
choicesHtml: A majority of the men polled identified with the Republican party.
More men than women voted for Ronald Reagan in 1984.
The younger a man was, the more likely he was to identify himself as a Democrat.
The Geraldine Ferraro vice-presidential candidacy caused many formerly Republican women to identify with the Democrats.
The gender gap among those who identified with the Republican party was narrowest for those between 25 and 34 years of age.
